divs: Sighting DetailsSalyersville, KentuckyI addition to my teacing in a middle school I worked as a bookkeeper.One nightas I returned home a I rounded a small curve that tool me into a clearing a thefoot of a hill.Tere was a house sitting on the right side of the road on a bank and two houseson the left side below the road which I was on.It was a nice cool clear nightand I had the driver side windows down in my pickup truck.Suddenly,a blue light began flashing inside the cab of my pickup.My firstthought was that a Ky Sate Police car was flashing my to pull over.I glancedinto my rearview mirror but saw nothing.The lights were still flashing inside mycabs so I looked glanced outside for the source and approximate 30 to my leftand about 25-30 feet over head was an object with blinking blue lights.My my first thought was maybe a balloon.But as quickly as I was it it beganmoving rapidly upward at an approximate 60 degree angle disappeared out ofsight.Its ability to move as rapidly as it did completely rules out a baloon orany thing which the military has.It took my approximate 30 from the time the object began its assent until I gotto the top of the little hill where I could get a view of the horizon.I was itagin bliking and it had moved so far away that now it appeared the size of abright star.Upon my return home my son and his fried who had been out side informed me ofseeing a blinking object in the sky abot 15minutes before I arrived.That wasabout the time I would have observed the object.There was one characteristic of the object which I never thought of untilwatching a ufo program on tv.That was this object made no sound.That was whythen thought of baloon came to me.That objects ability to move silently and its speed defies any thing which wehave on earth.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Salyersville
This sighting has never been favorited.
